welcome.text:
Hey, I'm ACE! You probably just read about me in the advertisement :). I just have 3 questions to see if I'd be a good fit!

What is your business's ad spend per month (approximate)?

budget_ack.text: Great, that budget is a solid fit for testing ACE's capabilities. Got it! Which platforms are you currently running ads on?

platform_ack.text: Nice, ACE has proven results on that platform. Lastly, what does your company do and what do you do at the company?
